Home → Libraries → Library and mobile library closures due to weather conditions

Library and mobile library closures due to weather conditions

This page was last updated on Mar 2, 2018 at 1628. For updates over the weekend 3-4 March check:

  • Our Facebook page
  • Our Twitter stream

We have limited coverage on our customer service line (01473 351249). If you can't get through contact us at:

  • help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
  • @suffolklibrary

Mobile libraries

None of our mobile libraries are running on 1, 2 or 3 March.

Libraries

  • Brandon Library closed 2 Mar
  • Broomhill Library open until 1700 2 Mar
  • Bury St Edmunds Library open until 1630 2 Mar
  • Chantry Library closed from 1500 2 Mar
  • Elmswell Library closed 2 Mar
  • Eye Library open until 1500 2 Mar
  • Gainsborough Community Library open 0930 - 1700 2 Mar
  • Glemsford Library open 1100 - 1600 2 Mar
  • Halesworth Library closed 1300 - 1400 and from 1700 2 Mar, closed 1300 - 1400 3 Mar.
  • Ipswich County Library closed from 1800 2 Mar
  • Ixworth Library closed from 1600 2 Mar
  • Kedington Library closed 3 Mar
  • Lavenham Library closed 2 Mar
  • Long Melford Library closed from 1800 2 Mar
  • Lowestoft Library closed from 1600 2 Mar
  • Newmarket Library open 1000 - 1600 2 Mar and 3 Mar
  • Oulton Broad Library closed from 1600 2 Mar
  • Rosehill Library open until 1700 2 Mar
  • Stowmarket Library open until 1700 2 Mar and from 0930 3 Mar
  • Sudbury Library open 1000 - 1600 2 Mar and from 1000 3 Mar
  • Woodbridge Library closed from 1700 2 Mar
